attributes.action: General Vote on Capital Punishment throughout the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Let the British Public have a vote on whether Capital Punishment should be reinstated for Paedophiles and Murderers in cases where there is overwhelming DNA evidence and a jury concludes guilty beyond all reasonable doubt.

 The UK needs a stronger deterrant the current Sentencing laws are not good enough and innocent men women and CHILDREN are losing their lives needlessly
